name: Jasper.ai
headline: Jasper is a leader in creating content using Artificial Intelligence
description: Launched in February 2021, Jasper is an AI content platform that helps creators and companies of all types expand their creative potential. Over 105,000 active customers are using Jasper to break through writer‚Äôs block, repackage their content, create original art, and adjust writing for language and tone. The interest in AI continues to grow and we are at the forefront of teaching the world how to leverage artificial intelligence as a creative partner. We are building teams that will pioneer the content generations space even further.

## ![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/60e5f2de011b86acebc30db7/67214941deea100e23211262_Platform.svg)
The Jasper Platform
Built for marketing success
Jasper is the purpose-built generative AI platform for marketing. Built on a foundation of enterprise trust, Jasper deeply understands marketing, delivering advanced brand control and an intuitive AI toolkit that allow marketers to build apps and workflows to accelerate their success.
[Explore the Platform](https://jasper.ai/</platform>)Explore the Platform
Explore the Platform
### JasperStudio
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/60e5f2de011b86acebc30db7/6705003561016ef8e6ad73bc_workflow-automations.svg)
Transform existing processes with AI-powered workflows integrated into your martech stack, so you can embed AI into every marketing process, empowering every marketer.
[](https://jasper.ai/</studio>)
### MarketingAI Toolkit
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/60e5f2de011b86acebc30db7/670500343589a24ac4d1b4b1_ai-applications.svg)

[](https://jasper.ai/</platform#marketing-toolkit>)
### Knowledge& Context
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/60e5f2de011b86acebc30db7/67050034e6501c14512a0e33_marketing-insights.svg)

[](https://jasper.ai/</platform#knowledge-and-context>)

![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/60e5f2de011b86acebc30db7/670500357b528e87088a47ef_trust-layer.svg)

generated_description:
**Company Overview: Jasper.ai**

Founded in February 2021 and based in Austin, Texas, Jasper.ai stands out as a leader in AI-driven content creation. The mission? To empower creators and businesses by harnessing artificial intelligence as a creative partner to enhance productivity and unlock new possibilities in content generation.

**Growth and Impact**

Since its launch, Jasper has rapidly grown its user base to over 105,000 active customers, a testament to its effectiveness in overcoming writer's block, repackaging content, and producing both written and visual content with finesse. This growth trajectory is nurtured by the ongoing surge of interest in AI, with Jasper positioning itself at the forefront of this trend.

With a talented team of 195 employees and membership in the Y Combinator Batch W18, Jasper is not just keeping pace‚Äîit's leading the charge in the evolving landscape of content creation. Under the guidance of its Group Partner, Nan, the company is innovating continuously to remain relevant and impactful.

**Product Offerings**

Jasper's platform is purpose-built for marketers and includes an array of sophisticated tools designed to streamline marketing workflows. Key highlights include:

- **JasperStudio**: An AI-powered workflow tool that integrates smoothly into marketing tech stacks.
- **Marketing Toolkit**: A comprehensive suite tailored for marketers that includes tools for content editing, brand voice adherence, and image editing.
- **AI App Library**: More than 90 out-of-the-box AI applications that span various marketing needs, directly connecting capabilities to marketing KPIs.

Each of these tools is designed to enhance marketing impact and ROI, enabling users to embed AI in every aspect of their marketing efforts, from content creation to strategy formulation.

**Customer Success Stories**

The effectiveness of Jasper's tools is reflected in the success stories from diverse industries. Customers, including industry giants like Cushion & Wakefield and WalkMe, report substantial time savings and increased creativity thanks to Jasper's AI-driven solutions.

**Community and Educational Resources**

Jasper.ai fosters a growing community of marketers dedicated to mastering AI. It offers a hub for learning through webinars, customer stories, and a prompt library designed to sharpen skills and formulate strategies that leverage AI effectively.

**Conclusion**

Jasper.ai is more than just a content creation tool; it's a revolutionary force in the marketing landscape. With its advanced AI capabilities and a clear commitment to quality, Jasper helps marketers elevate their game and build lasting connections with their audiences. If you're looking to transform how you create content, Jasper.ai might just be the partner you need.

For more information, you can visit their [website](https://jasper.ai).
